questions.a: January 11, 2026 - Mark your calendar! Sign up for our newsletter at thehermeticflight.com to receive launch notification and early-bird access.

questions.q: What pledge levels will be available?
questions.a:
We're finalizing tiers, but expect:

  • Early Bird Special - Deck + guidebook at reduced price (limited quantity)
  • Standard Pledge - Deck + comprehensive guidebook
  • Deluxe Edition - Includes premium packaging upgrades (may include gilded edges, fabric pouch, or other enhancements)
  • Professional Reader Bundle - Multiple decks at reduced per-deck pricing
  • Supporter/Collector Tiers - Signed editions, original photography prints, or other exclusive items

Follow the campaign for official pricing and tier details.

We're committed to realistic timelines with buffer room. Current estimate: Q4 2026 (October-December 2026).

This timeline accounts for:

  • Photography complete (already done!)
  • Graphic design and layout: Q1 2026
  • Proof review and revisions: Q2 2026
  • Printing and production: Q3 2026
  • Shipping and fulfillment: Q4 2026

We'll provide monthly updates throughout the process. Delays can happen in printing/shipping, so we've built in cushion time rather than promising aggressive timelines we can't meet.

Yes! We plan to ship worldwide with appropriate customs declaration and tracking. International backers should expect:

  • Additional shipping costs (calculated by region)
  • Potential customs duties (determined by your country, not by us)
  • Longer delivery windows for some regions

We'll clearly communicate all costs before campaign launch so international backers can make informed decisions.

questions.q: What if I can't afford to back right now?
questions.a:
We understand! The deck will be available for retail purchase after Kickstarter fulfillment, though likely at a higher price than campaign early-bird tiers. You can also:

  • Follow free content on our blog and social media
  • Join our community Discord/Facebook group
  • Sign up for the newsletter for future sales and promotions

The Kickstarter exclusive items (if any) will be clearly marked so you know what's limited vs. what will be available later.
